CodeIssue.Title: Cipher.getInstance("DES
CodeIssue.Description: The code appears to use the DES algorithm. This is no longer considered secure and a safe alternative such as AES should be used instead.

CodeIssue.Title: java.util.Random
CodeIssue.Description: This package is flawed and produces predictable values for any given seed which are easily reproducible once the starting seed is identified.
